title: Calories in Avocado Toast
meta_description: Discover calories in avocado toast for a standard serving, including macros like fats, carbs, protein, plus tweaks and FAQs for better nutrition tracking.
assumptions: One slice whole wheat bread, toasted; half medium avocado (68 g) mashed; pinch of salt. No extras like oil or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, avocado ripeness, size, and additions like seasonings or spreads. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard serving of avocado toast provides ~250 kcal, rich in healthy monounsaturated fats.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add one fried egg on top
Use white bread instead of whole wheat

faqs.q: How many calories are in one avocado toast?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal for a basic serving with whole wheat bread and half an avocado.

faqs.q: Is avocado toast high in healthy fats?
faqs.a: Yes, ~16 g total fat per serving, mostly monounsaturated from the avocado.

faqs.q: How much fiber in avocado toast?
faqs.a: Around 10 g per serving, thanks to the avocado and whole grain bread.

faqs.q: Does adding salt affect calories in avocado toast?
faqs.a: No impact on calories, but it increases sodium; use sparingly.

faqs.q: Can I make avocado toast lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, use less avocado (quarter instead of half) to drop ~60 kcal, or opt for lighter bread.
